# Supported Versions

VeinGuard is designed to work with **Minecraft Spigot and Paper servers**.  
Currently, the plugin fully supports **Minecraft 1.21 and newer**.

Future releases may include backwards compatibility for older Minecraft versions, but the number of versions supported has not yet been determined.

Check the table below to see whether VeinGuard is compatible with your server version.

---

## Compatibility

| Minecraft Version | Paper | Spigot |
|------------------|:-----:|:------:|
| 1.17.x            | ❌    | ❌     |
| 1.18.x            | ❌    | ❌     |
| 1.19.x            | ❌    | ❌     |
| 1.20.x            | ❌    | ❌     |
| 1.21.x            | ✔️    | ✔️     |
